Detailed Description

cvmx_dfa_memfadr

DFA_MEMFADR = RLDRAM Failing Address/Control Register

Description: DFA Memory Failing Address/Control Error Capture information This register contains useful information to help in isolating an RLDRAM memory failure. NOTE: The first detected SEC/DED/PERR failure is captured in DFA_MEMFADR, however, a DED or PERR (which is more severe) will always overwrite a SEC error. The user can 'infer' the source of the interrupt via the FSRC field. NOTE: If DFA_MEMCFG2[DTECLKDIS]=1, the contents of this register are UNDEFINED.
